title: Cock-a-leekie soup for a crowd
ingredients: ['1.75kg (4 lb) chicken thighs', '2.5L (4 pints) water', '1 onion, chopped', '50g (2 oz) pearl barley', '275ml (10 fl oz) chicken stock', '7 leeks, sliced', '2 sticks celery, sliced', '1 sprig fresh thyme, leaves chopped', 'small handful chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
